list-item.p: In the past 12 months (or since last time you completed this form), have any of your sexual partners done any of the following: Pushed, pulled, slapped, or held you down? Punched you? Kicked you or dragged you? Tried to strangle or burn you? Threatened or attacked you with a gun/knife/other weapon?
In the past 12 months (or since last time you completed this form), has anyone physically forced you to have sex with him when you did not want to?
